name: CresGarurumon
effect: ＜Reboot＞ (Unsuspend this Digimon during your opponent's unsuspend phase.)[When Digivolving] Reveal 1 card from the top of your deck for each Digimon your opponent has in play. You may play 1 black or red Digimon card with a level of 5 or less among them without paying its memory cost. Place the remaining cards at the bottom of your deck in any order.
